subject: Throttle stuck issue
description_text:
Hello,

I have a software issue, my throttle is in the fully back position (no
pressure on it) and in the simsonn software I am at 45% throttle.

[image: {B8D89423-6D1F-4A07-9645-02926D02EE25}.png]

Please help, I have tried unplugging the USB as well as the controller with
nothing working.

conversations.body_text: Hi Nick,  Which version of the pedal are you using? Once confirmed, I’ll provide you with the appropriate solution.
